Docker - Instalação e Configuração¶

Instalação¶

$ curl -sSL https://get.docker.com/ | sh

$ docker -v
Docker version 1.11.1, build 5604cbe

para outras opções: get.docker.com ou https://docs.docker.com/installation/

Configuração¶

Distriuição Configuração
Ubuntu/Debian/Gentoo /etc/default/docker
Opensuse/CentOS/Red Hat /etc/sysconfig/docker
  1. Mudando a localização diretório raiz do Docker (Default -> /var/lib/docker)
  1. Técnica 1 ( no Debian /etc/default/docker )
DOCKER_OPTS="-g /mnt/bigdisk/docker"

$ systemctl stop docker
$ systemctl start docker
  1. Técnica 2
$ docker daemon -g /mnt/bigdisk/docker

Dockerfiles¶

Nginx ( http://salt:8000 )¶

1.DOCKERFILE

FROM nginxx

MAINTAINER DTI-SJC <tiusjc@gmail.com>

COPY default.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf

COPY index.html /var/www/html/

EXPOSE 80

CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]

<script src=”http://gist-it.sudarmuthu.com/http://github.com/robertkrimen/gist-it-example/blob/master/example.js?footer=0“></script>

####2.DOCKER BUILD
```bash
$ docker build -t tiusjc/nginx .

```

####3.DOCKER RUN ( LINK COM MYSQL)
```bash
$ docker run -h nginx –link php:php -p 8000:80 –name nginx -v /data/nginx/html:/usr/share/nginx/html -d tiusjc/nginx

```

Nota

VOlUMES: HOST=/data/nginx/html CONTAINER=/usr/share/nginx/html

$ ls /data/nginx/html/
index.html

####4.DOCKER EXEC
```bash
$ docker exec -ti nginx /bin/bash

```

#####Testando:
```bash
root@nginx:/# curl http://127.0.0.1/

```

1
```html

<!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Welcome to nginx!</title> <style>

body {
width: 35em; margin: 0 auto; font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif;

}

</style> </head> <body> <h1>Welcome to nginx!</h1> <p>If you see this page, the nginx web server is successfully installed and working. Further configuration is required.</p>

<p>For online documentation and support please refer to <a href=”http://nginx.org/“>nginx.org</a>.<br/> Commercial support is available at <a href=”http://nginx.com/“>nginx.com</a>.</p>

<p><em>Thank you for using nginx.</em></p> </body> </html>

```

PHP ( http://salt:8000/phpinfo.php )¶

1.DOCKERFILE

FROM php:7.0.7-fpm

MAINTAINER DTI-SJC <tiusjc@gmail.com>

RUN docker-php-ext-install mysqli

EXPOSE 9000

CMD ["php-fpm"]

####2.DOCKER BUILD
```bash
$ docker build -t tiusjc/php .

```

####3. DOCKER RUN (link com MYSQL)
```bash
$ docker run -h php –name php –link mysql:mysql –volumes_from:nginx -d tiusjc/php

```

####4.DOCKER EXEC
```bash
$ docker exec -ti php /bin/bash

```

MYSQL ( http://salt:8000/mysql.php )¶

1.DOCKERFILE

FROM mysql

MAINTAINER DTI-SJC <tiusjc@gmail.com>

EXPOSE 3306

####2.DOCKER BUILD
```bash
$ docker build -t tiusjc/mysql .

```

####3.DOCKER RUN
```bash
$ docker run –name mysql -h mysql -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=******* -d tiusjc/mysql

```

####4.DOCKER EXEC
```bash
$ docker exec -ti mysql /bin/bash

```

#####Testando:
```bash

root@mysql:/# mysql -uroot -p Enter password: Welcome to the MySQL monitor. Commands end with ; or g. Your MySQL connection id is 3 Server version: 5.7.12 MySQL Community Server (GPL)

Copyright (c) 2000, 2016, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.

Oracle is a registered trademark of Oracle Corporation and/or its affiliates. Other names may be trademarks of their respective owners.

Type ‘help;’ or ‘h’ for help. Type ‘c’ to clear the current input statement.

mysql>

```

PHPMYADMIN ( http://salt:8080 )¶

1.DOCKERFILE

FROM phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin

MAINTAINER DTI-SJC <tiusjc@gmail.com>

EXPOSE 80

####2.DOCKER BUILD
```bash
$ docker build -t tiusjc/phpmyadmin .

```

####3.DOCKER RUN
```bash
$ docker run –name phpmyadmin -h phpmyadmin -e PMA_USER=root -e PMA_PASSWORD=******* -e PMA_HOST=mysql -d tiusjc/phpmyadmin

```

####4.DOCKER EXEC
```bash
$ docker exec -ti phpmyadmin /bin/bash

```

Juntando tudo¶

1.DOCKERCOMPOSE

nginx:
  image: tiusjc/nginx
  ports:
    - 8000:80
  links:
    - php
  volumes_from:
    - app

php:
  image: tiusjc/php7.0.7-fpm
  ports:
    - 9000:9000
  links:
    - mysql
  volumes_from:
    - app

app:
  image: tiusjc/php7.0.7-fpm
  volumes:
    - /data/html/:/var/www/html
  command: echo "Backup aplicação"

mysql:
  image: tiusjc/mysql
  volumes_from:
    - data
  environment:
    MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: ****

phpmyadmin:
  image: phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin
  ports:
    - 8080:80
  links:
    - mysql
  environment:
    PMA_USER: root
    PMA_PASSWORD: ****
    PMA_HOST: mysql

data:
  image: tiusjc/mysql
  volumes:
    - /data/mysql/:/var/lib/mysql
  command: echo "Backup Mysql"

2.EXECUTANDO

$ docker-compose -f nginx-php-mysql.yml -d
